actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the FCC should take such action as is necessary to protect American children from certain violence to be broadcast over the public airwaves.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the broadcast of the Knievel death leap over fourteen buses will have harmful effects on the Nations' children. Calls upon the Federal Communications Commission to take action to protect against such effects.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the FCC should take such action as is necessary to protect American children from certain violence to be broadcast over the public airwaves.
